korean: 사격 시 [명중률]을 결정합니다. [명중률]은 거리가 멀면 감소합니다.
english: Determines the [Hit Rate] when shooting. [Hit Rate] decreases when the distance is far.

korean: [시야 범위] 만큼의 타일을 볼 수 있습니다.
english: You can see as many tiles as [View Range].

korean: 전투의 턴 순서를 결정합니다. [속도]가 크게 차이난다면 행동 횟수도 달라집니다.
english: Determines the turn order of battle. If [Speed] is significantly different
column4: the number of actions will also vary.

english: 공격 등의 행동을 할 수 있습니다.
column5: you can perform actions such as moving and attacking.

english: It is calculated by adding [Bonus Hit Rate] to [Hit Rate].

korean: [치명타 확률]에 따라 공격 시 치명타가 발생합니다.
column4: a critical hit occurs when attacking.
When an attack is applied as a critical hit
column5: the attack becomes stronger by [Critical Damage].
